# isHorizontallyCentered

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the image is centered horizontally.

## Declaration

```swift
var isHorizontallyCentered: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the image is centered horizontally; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Positioning the Image on the Page

- **isVerticallyCentered**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the image is centered vertically.
